page.title: 13Three Schools Sports Day
page.content: In North Bedfordshire there are many small village schools of less than 50 children aged 4 to 9 years. Every year we have a joint Sports Day with two small schools,Colmworth and Wilden. We take it in turns to have Sports Day at our own school.This year it was our turn to invite them to come to our school field. We start with sprint races for all. Then come the novelty races -a hoop race, bucket and beanbag race, potato and spoon race and an obstacle race. After that there is a novelty relay in which each team has 5 children, one from each year.The oldest one waits in the middle of the track, the other 4 are at the start. They run taking with them in turn a hat, case, umbrella and boots to the waiting child, who puts on the hat and boots and carries the bag and umbrella to the finish.It is great fun.
